title: Squirrel Terrorist

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At day, shoot a target, if the target is a rabbit they are immune. (2 times use)
- At night, shoot your exploding nuts and cause a rampage at the targets house, if you target yourself only you are shot. (1 time use)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - Everytime you kill someone your defence increases.

desc:
Post 5020
*Squirrel throws his exploding nuts and people laugh.*
